7.ara-name: كتاب الزكاة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Eisa bin Talhah narrated that :Mu'adh had written to the Prophet to ask him about greens - which is "herbs" - so he (pbuh) said, "There is nothing due on them

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي زَكَاةِ الْخُضْرَوَاتِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Zakat On Greens (Produce)
